name: Custom Grouped Table View
tagline: Fully customizable grouped table view cells.
body:
Use `CustomGroupedCellBackground` to give table view cell any kind of background you want.

Rounded corners are handled in a `UITableView` category (instead of a subclass) to minimize headache. Just put any cell that is a subclass of `CustomGroupedCell` in your table view, and Voil√†! 

![Works with prototype cells](https://github.com/JosephLin/CustomGroupedTableView/blob/gh-pages/images/screenshot_prototype_cells.png)

![as well as static cells](https://github.com/JosephLin/CustomGroupedTableView/blob/gh-pages/images/screenshot_static_cells.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
